title: Spaghetti with courgette, tomato and feta
ingredients: ['500g spaghetti', '600g tomatoes', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, diced', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '600g courgettes, juilienned', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 teaspoon herbes de Provence', '200ml single cream', 'chopped fresh basil, to taste', '200g feta cheese, diced']
